plot: Sex, potatoes, weapons - the alchemical substance called money can transform anything into anything. Humanity's most consequential invention is both brilliant and fatal.
title: Der Schein trügt
plot_es: Sex, potatoes, weapons - the alchemical substance called money can transform anything into anything. Humanity's most consequential invention is both brilliant and fatal.
plot_en: Sex, potatoes, weapons - the alchemical substance called money can transform anything into anything. Humanity's most consequential invention is both brilliant and fatal.
